## Install `R`

Let’s install the newest version of __R__. This is the free programming language that will process your analysis behind the scenes.

__Install R__  

1. Open the ` G:\Lapps\R ` folder.
1. Double click the ` R-3.4.2-win.exe ` file.
1. In the pop-up window, click the Ok and Next buttons until you reach the end.

_Backup plan:_ Download R from [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/).
  
  
## Install `RStudio` 

Now let's install the newest-coolest version of __RStudio__. This is the user interface we’ll use to write R scripts and keep our projects organized.

__Install RStudio__  

1. Open the Start menu. \ \*_Click the Window's logo on the bottom left of the screen._
1. Search for _Software Center_
1. Select ` R Studio-1.1.383 - Install `
1. Click the blue _INSTALL_ button down in the lower right.
1. A secret window will open behind the _Software Center_. Find it by minimizing the _Software Center_.
1. In the installation window, click _Next_.
1. Install RStudio to the default folder `C:\Program Files `
1. You are officially ready.

_Backup plan:_ Download RStudio from [www.rstudio.com](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download).
